categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Evan-Ott was a male Jedi Padawan who was apprenticed to Master Sora Mobari. In 22 BBY, Evan-Ott tried to kill his Master in an explosion, but died himself in the attempt. Mobari ultimately succumbed to her wounds as well.

A Force-sensitive male, Evan-Ott was a Padawan in the Jedi Order and apprenticed to Master Sora Mobari during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In 22 BBY, Evan-Ott and his Master were sent to the planet Ithor to lead an attack against Ithorian terrorists. However, Evan-Ott betrayed Mobari and tried to kill her in an explosion. While Mobari initially survived the blast, the Padawan was killed. Master Mobari later succumbed to her mortal injuries while at a Republic medcenter on the planet New Holstice.
The Jedi Evan-Ott betrayed his Master and tried to kill her.

Evan-Ott was first mentioned, albeit unnamed, in the comic book Republic 58, written by W. Haden Blackman and released by Dark Horse Comics on December 17, 2003. The character later received a name in the 2008 reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
